title: New: SUNKEN – Swoon
body:
Photo:Isobel WP

South London has become a real hot bed for buzzy emerging artists recently, and **SUNKEN** are very much at the forefront of it.

Having teased a couple of demos over the course of the past year, they’ve taken their boldest step yet with their latest cut, _Swoon_. A real woozy, tantalising languid number, it’s effortlessly cool, managing to seamlessly merge blues and pop influences to stunning effect. Check it out below.
